mapper.insert: insert into report(reporter, reported_user, category, content, detail, post_idx, comment_idx) values( #{reporter}, #{reportedUser}, #{category}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{detail}, ''), COALESCE(#{post_idx}, 0), COALESCE(#{comment_idx}, 0) );
mapper.select: select * from report where reporter=#{reporter} and post_idx=#{post_idx} and comment_idx=#{comment_idx} and category=#{category} LIMIT 1

select r.*, p.report_status p_status, c.report_status c_status from report r left outer join post p on r.post_idx = p.post_idx left outer join post_comment c on r.comment_idx = c.comment_idx order by report_idx desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
